snippet: Unesco honors the courage of a journalist unfairly imprisoned in Azerbaijan, where the first lady is one of the agency’s good-will ambassadors.
abstract: Editorial urges United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization to rescind good-will ambassador honor given to Azerbaijani First Lady Mehriban Aliyeva in 2004 due to her family's role in intimidating and imprisoning journalist Khadija Ismayilova; notes Ismayilova's efforts to expose Pres Ilham Aliyev's secret financial holdings; calls for international leaders to pressure Azerbaijan to release Ismayilova.
lead_paragraph: Unesco honors the courage of a journalist unfairly imprisoned in Azerbaijan, where the first lady is one of the agency’s good-will ambassadors.

headline.print_headline: A First Lady and a Jailed Journalist
headline.main: A First Lady and a Jailed Journalist
